flawed_nl_solution:
Mary gives away 26/2 = <<26/2=13>>13 blue shirts.
Mary gives away 36/3 = <<36/3=12>>12 brown shirts.
Mary has 26-13 = <<26-13=13>>13 blue shirts left.
Mary has 36-12 = <<36-12=24>>24 brown shirts left.
Mary has 13+24 = <<13+24=73>>73 shirts left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 37.0, not 73.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
